summary: Previous issues were addressed with correct time window clamping and proper consecutive-clean logic.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Consecutive clean window incorrectly failed whenever wouldRejectTotal > 0
previous_issues_status.notes: Now uses elapsed time since last would-reject and compares against window regardless of total.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Observation window could go negative under clock skew
previous_issues_status.notes: Now clamps observationMs to zero via Math.max(0, now - deployTimestamp).
